definition: (usually plural) the state of having reflex spasms of the diaphragm accompanied by a rapid closure of the glottis producing an audible sound, breathe spasmodically, and make a sound
details:
noun
- (usually plural) the state of having reflex spasms of the diaphragm accompanied by a rapid closure of the glottis producing an audible sound
= synonyms: hiccough, singultus
verb
- breathe spasmodically, and make a sound
= example: breathe spasmodically, and make a sound
= synonyms: hiccough
